oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Christian Brothers College Aerial Showing the Union Railroad
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Aerial photographs; Educational facilities; Railroads; Aerial views
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Union Railroad was still visible in this aerial view of Christian Brothers College. In 1951, CBC acquired the right-of-way, allowing the removal of the tracks.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
